overview: Zinabu refuses to be circumcised. She has heard about the consequences she will face after the cut and she fears to go through the rite. The only way to get her ready for any dowry was by circumcision. What will she do?  Asibi on the other hand has to become the fifth wife of Alhaji Abu. Her dowry was paid when she was still a baby, and Alhaji is coming to take her with him because she has come of age. Meanwhile, Asibi wants something else. What could that be?
title: A Taken Pleasure
